headline: Show HN: Parsers VC – Real-time tracking Venture Capital data provider
description: Parsers VC collects data on startups, investors, and venture capital firms in real time. The databases are updated every 24 hours. It's very simple: Parsers VC installs its trackers on the venture capital funds' websites (namely the startup, team, and news sections) and automatically collects all updates. The data is also obtained from social networks and news sites. Thus, there is no need to wait for the startup or venture capital firm itself to update the information on the aggregator site, all updates appear by themselves. You can see examples of the data here: https://parsers.vc/about/
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: Parsers VC - 实时跟踪风险投资数据的供应商
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: Parsers VC - 實時跟蹤風險投資數據的供應商
description_zh-Hans: Parsers VC实时收集关于初创企业、投资者和风险投资公司的数据。这些数据库每24小时更新一次。 这非常简单。Parsers VC将其跟踪器安装在风险投资基金的网站上（即创业公司、团队和新闻部分），并自动收集所有的更新。这些数据也是从社交网络和新闻网站获得的。Thus, there is no need to wait for the startup or venture capital firm itself to update the information on the aggregator site, all updates appear by themselves. You can see examples of the data here: https://parsers.vc/about/
description_zh-Hant: Parsers VC實時收集關於初創企業、投資者和風險投資公司的數據。這些數據庫每24小時更新一次。 這非常簡單。Parsers VC將其跟蹤器安裝在風險投資基金的網站上（即創業公司、團隊和新聞部分），並自動收集所有的更新。這些數據也是從社交網絡和新聞網站獲得的。Thus, there is no need to wait for the startup or venture capital firm itself to update the information on the aggregator site, all updates appear by themselves. You can see examples of the data here: https://parsers.vc/about/
